{{Wired embedded system |brand=AppNeta |model=PathView microAppliance |revision=m20 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=GlobalScale |manuf_model=SheevaPlug |manuf_rev=V8R1 (003-SP1001) |type=network monitor |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0B-PCB0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS1G831CFP-S6 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 8-pin header |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell v3.4.16; |stock_os=Linux;3.1.10-ani04;Ubuntu 9.04; |default_user=root |default_pass=appneta.admin |oui_eth=F0:AD:4E }} :[https://docs.appneta.com/appliance-specs-physical.html#ubuntu Device Specs]
This is a relabeled stripped down [[GlobalScale SheevaPlug]] V8R1 running ''AppNeta Pathview''
